titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Charles B. Wurtz was a research associate in the Department of Mollusks at the Academy of Natural Sciences from 1941 to 1957 and an honorary research associate from 1957 to 1960. He was an assistant professor in the Biology Department at La Salle College and a member of the American Society of Limnology and Oceanography.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers related to Charles B. Wurtz. Materials include: incoming and outgoing correspondence, 1947-1950; queries and responses on the identification of species; loans of specimens; and requests for reprints.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
